Microsoft( Nasdaq: MSFT) CEO Steve Ballmer debuted the cloud version of the Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011 release on Monday. Sales professionals are at the heart of almost every successful business, Steve Ballmer said. Microsoft Dynamics CRM gives them a familiar user experience, enables greater collaboration, streamlines processes, and provides access to real-time data that helps them compete more effectively, he noted.
